events.description: Join us for the 2nd Annual Black History Film Festival in Miami in Liberty City as we showcase Black stories as part of a national network. The Black History Film Festival was created by Marvin Arrington Jr in Atlanta in 2008. The festival expanded to Washington, DC in 2015 hosted by Richard Campbell. In 2024, the Black History Film Festival expanded to Miami. We like to keep in local as part of the City's revitalization program and host the screenings in Liberty City. More information to come.

events.title: How to Design with AI - Meta & UKG
events.description: ​ ​How to Design with AI — Meta & UKG ​ ​AI is changing how we design. This is a high-energy, interactive AI & UX workshop with live demos, hands-on exercises, and a Q&A you can steer in real time. ​ Meet designers, product folks, and AI-curious builders—then leave with practical ways to bring AI into your design workflow (starting tomorrow). ​ ​Speakers ​ ​ Agnel Nieves Fuentes — Sr UI & UX Designer, UKG ​ ​ Daniel Rodriguez — Senior Product Designer, AI, Meta ​ ​Date & Time ​ ​⏰ Feb 24, 2026 |

events.title: Why They Didn’t Invest
events.description: ​ Most founders never hear the real reason an investor passed. ​ The feedback is vague. The follow-up goes quiet. And founders are left guessing whether it was the pitch, the numbers, the market or something they didn’t even realize they were signaling. ​ This Ugly Talk pulls back the curtain on investor “no’s.” Not the polite ones, but the real ones: flawed data rooms, misaligned narratives, weak fundamentals, and timing mistakes that quietly kill deals. We’ll also examine the deals investors r
